Best Film:
''' No Country for Old Men '''
The '''5th Iowa Film Critics Awards''', honoring the best in film for [[2007 in film|2007]], were held on 16 January 2008. [[Coen Brothers|The Coen Brothers]]' '''''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country for Old Men]]''''' won three awards at the 2007 Iowa Critic's awards: Best Picture, Best Director, and Best Supporting Actor (Javier Bardem). ==Winners== *Best Actor: **[[Philip Seymour Hoffman]] - ''[[Before the Devil Knows You're Dead]]'', ''[[Charlie Wilson's War]]'', and ''[[The Savages (film)|The Savages]]'' *Best Actress: **[[Julie Christie]] - ''[[Away from Her]]'' *Best Animated Feature: **''[[Ratatouille (film)|Ratatouille]]'' *Best Director: **[[Coen Brothers|Joel and Ethan Coen]] - ''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country for Old Men]]'' *Best Film: **'''''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country for Old Men]]''''' *Best Film Yet to Open in Iowa: **''[[There Will Be Blood]] *Best Supporting Actor: **[[Javier Bardem]] - ''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country for Old Men]]'' *Best Supporting Actress: **[[Amy Ryan]] - ''[[Gone Baby Gone]]'' {{IFC Awards Chron}} [[Category:Iowa Film Critics Awards]] [[Category:2007 film awards]]
